message: The next day, I have a hard time waking up. The moment I open my eyes, I immediately grimace in pain.
My head and my face and my stomach all ache. My arms and legs feel numb and heavy.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh... Ouch..."
As I'm trying to get up, I notice Mink's bird perched on the headboard of my bed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh...? Morning..."
The sound of my voice surprises me. It's raspy and hoarse. Is it because I'm just getting up? Or...
I fight back a wave of shame.
The bird just looks at me, his little head cocked to the side.
I wait for a moment, but it doesn't seem like he hasany intention of talking.
I get out of bed and take a couple of my few remaining pills.
Then I get dressed, pick up Ren, and turn him on.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Morning, Ren."

name: 蓮
message: "Morning, Aoba. How are you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haha."
When I open the door to leave the room, the bird flies past me and out into the hall.
...Why was he even there?
Maybe it's because of the bird... but for some reason, Mink's presence still hangs heavy in the room.
I leave the room and head down the hall.
I need a bath...
